price: We give both – the latter and the former – from the bounty of your Lord, and Your Lord’s bounty is not restricted[18].
arabic: كُلّٗا نُّمِدُّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَهَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مِنۡ عَطَآءِ رَبِّكَۚ وَمَا كَانَ عَطَآءُ رَبِّكَ مَحۡظُورًا
footnotes: [18] Allah gives provision for all in the life of this world without exception.
